short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will save page to e-mail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple service to send web pages to E-Mail in readable format. Please note that webpage (including forms and sensitive data) will be processed on external server (savetoemail.com) to transform to readable format.
